Description: On I-664 in the City of Suffolk, at Monitor Merrimac Memorial Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. All north lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 8.6 in the County of Washington, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north left shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 West in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On Rt. 694 in the County of Roanoke, in the vicinity of Mowles Rd, motorists can expect delays due to weather. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Closed

Description: On US-58 in the County of Halifax, in the vicinity of Huell Matthews Hwy; Main St; US-501N/S; County/City/Town Line: SOUTH BOSTON, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer
